resources.string:
Side Menu
 By pressing the burger button on the top left corner you may access the Side Menu Options:

 - Map Option: Allows access to the Map Screen.
 - Alarms Option: Allows access to the Alarms Screen.
 - Tracking Option: Allows to turn on/off the real-time tracking of the user location.

 Map Screen
 The Map Screen shows a representation of the real-time location of the user and the established Geo-Alarms with their respective trigger radius.

 - User Location: The current user location, represented by a reddish arrow.
 - Set Alarm: In order to set an alarm press a location on the map where you want the alarm to be located or use the search button at the bottom of the screen to find a place where to locate the alarm.
 Once the alarm location has been established:
 - Cancel it by pressing another place on the map.
 - Confirm the alarm by using the bar at the bottom of the screen that has appeared to determinate the radius of such alarm.

 Alarms Screen
 The Alarms Screen shows a list of the currently saved Geo-Alarms and Alarms the user has created. From this screen the user may edit or delete both Geo-Alarms and Alarms (Allowing to also create this last ones):

 - Create an Alarm: In order to create an Alarm press on the bottom right button of this screen with a "+" icon.
 - Edit or Delete a Geo-Alarm: In order to edit or delete a Geo-Alarm press on the name of such Geo-Alarm on the list of Geo-Alarms of this screen (After creating it from the Map Screen).
 - Edit or Delete an Alarm: In order to edit or delete an Alarm press on the name of such Alarm on the list of Alarms of this screen (After creating it from the bottom right button of this same screen).

 Alarm Creation / Edit / Delete Form
 By pressing the "+" button on the bottom right corner of the Alarms Screen you may access this form to create a new Alarm, or by pressing the name of an Alarm in the Alarms List in order to Edit or Delete it:

 - Alarm name: Represents the name of the Alarm.
 - Trigger time: Indicates the time in a 24 hour format when the Alarm will trigger.
 - All days active: Toggle button which indicates if the Alarm triggers all days of the week (If such is turn off, a toggle for each day of week will be displayed for the user to configure the active day/s).

 Geo-Alarm Edit / Delete Form
 By pressing the name of a Geo-Alarm on the list you may access the form of such Geo-Alarm in order to edit or delete it.

 - Alarm name: Represents the name of the Geo-Alarm.
 - Sleep time: Indicates the interval of time needed to pass in order for the Geo-Alarm to be once again triggered.
 - Active when outside radius: When active the Geo-Alarm will trigger when the user is outside the radius instead of being inside of it.
 - All time active: When active the Geo-Alarm will trigger at any time as long as the user is in the trigger area for such alarm (If disabled, a field indicating the Start time for the alarm to start being active and an Interval time representing the time from this Start time when the Geo-Alarm can be triggered will be displayed).
 - All days active: Toggle button which indicates if the Alarm triggers all days of the week (If such is turn off, a toggle for each day of week will be displayed for the user to configure the active day/s).

 Settings Screen
 Access the Settings Screen by pressing the three dots at the top right corner at any time and the "Settings" option on the displayed options list:

 - Alarm Ringtone: Choose a personalized ringtone for your alarms.
 - Alarm Style: Choose the interface style that suits your liking.
 - Language: Choose your preferred app language.

 Help Screen
 Access this Help Screen by pressing the three dots at the top right corner at any time and the "Help" option on the displayed options list.
